product_description: Merida Industry Co., Ltd is a Taiwan-based company with R&D headquarters in Germany that designs, manufactures, and markets bicycles globally in over 77 countries. Founded in 1972 by Ike Tseng, the company designs and manufactures over two million bicycles a year at its factories in Taiwan, China, and Germany. After making bicycles as an original equipment manufacturer for numerous other brands, the company established its own brand, Merida, in 1988. Merida has been a publicly traded company on the Taiwanese stock exchange since 1992 and is valued at approximately £350 million, making it one of Taiwan's largest companies.
